text: Allauch is a commune of 19,400 people (2005). It is in the region Provence- Alpes-Côte d'Azur in the Bouches-du-Rhône department in the south of France. ==Related pages== * Communes of the Bouches-du-Rhône department * Arrondissements of the Bouches-du-Rhône department ==Other websites== *Allauch official website *Allauch official tourism website Category:Communes in Bouches-du-Rhône
title: Allauch
